entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle late this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
